item.title: Torver
item.description: 1 night Wild camp at Torver My brother Tom and his girlfriend Pluggy were staying in the Lake District and we’d planned to go mountain biking in Grizedale. The night before, James and I slept drove up late to Torver for our first night in the campervan. We’d eaten beforehand so it was just a case of parking up and getting to sleep. When we arrived, there was another campervan at the parking spot.
